error.forbidden.description: Стандартный отказ выполнить действие из-за отсутствия прав
error.forbidden.eng: Not enough permissions. If you believe this is a mistake, please contact KazVixX

error.bad_duration_format.description: Ошибка, возникающая при предоставлении невалидной строки в качестве длительности (например, бана)

param_descriptions.duration: Строчка, предоставленная юзером в качестве длительности. Ожидается, что она уже предварительно отформатирована как код

error.bad_duration_format.eng: Failed to parse a duration from string: {duration}. The expected format is described [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations)
error.bad_duration_format.rus: Не удалось спарсить продолжительность из предоставленной строки: {duration}. Ожидаемый формат описан [здесь](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations)

errors.expected_positive_duration.description: Ошибка, возникающая, когда юзер пытается передать в команду отрицательную длительность (например, бана)

param_descriptions.duration_secs: Длительность бана в секундах, предоставленная пользователем

errors.expected_positive_duration.eng: Cannot do that for a negative amount of time (got: {duration_secs} seconds)
errors.expected_positive_duration.rus: Данное действие не позволяет указать отрицательную продолжительность (в данном случае, {duration_secs} секунд)

errors.duration_exceeds_max_allowed.description: Ошибка, возникающая при передаче продолжительности больше разрешенного максимума
errors.duration_exceeds_max_allowed.eng: Provided duration exceeds the maximum allowed ({max_duration_secs} secs)
errors.duration_exceeds_max_allowed.rus: Предоставленная продолжительность превышает максимально допустимую ({max_duration_secs} секунд)

level_ban_command.already_banned.longer.eng: Requested ban until {formatted_new_expiration_time}, but level `{level_id}` (`{level_name}`) is already banned until {formatted_old_expiration_time}
level_ban_command.already_banned.longer.rus: Requested ban until {formatted_new_expiration_time}, but level `{level_id}` (`{level_name}`) is already banned until {formatted_old_expiration_time}

request_command.on_cooldown.eng: Please wait, you will be able to create new request {formatted_cd_expiration_time}
request_command.on_cooldown.rus: Please wait, you will be able to create new request {formatted_cd_expiration_time}

request_command.user_banned.forever.reas.eng: You were banned from requesting levels. Reason: **{ban_reason}**
request_command.user_banned.forever.reas.rus: You were banned from requesting levels. Reason: **{ban_reason}**

request_command.user_banned.forever.no_r.eng: You were banned from requesting levels
request_command.user_banned.forever.no_r.rus: You were banned from requesting levels

request_command.user_banned.temporarily..eng: You were banned from requesting levels (reason: **{ban_reason}**). You will be able to create new request {formatted_ban_expiration_time}
request_command.user_banned.temporarily..rus: You were banned from requesting levels (reason: **{ban_reason}**). You will be able to create new request {formatted_ban_expiration_time}

request_command.user_banned.temporarily..eng: You were banned from requesting levels. You will be able to create new request {formatted_ban_expiration_time}
request_command.user_banned.temporarily..rus: You were banned from requesting levels. You will be able to create new request {formatted_ban_expiration_time}

request_command.closed.eng: Sorry, the requests are temporarily closed
request_command.closed.rus: Sorry, the requests are temporarily closed

request_modal.unfeatured.eng: Failed to send a level request: level `{level_name}` was unfeatured by RobTop previously
request_modal.unfeatured.rus: Failed to send a level request: level `{level_name}` was unfeatured by RobTop previously

request_modal.already_rated.eng: Failed to send a level request: level `{level_name}` is already {level_quality}!
request_modal.already_rated.rus: Failed to send a level request: level `{level_name}` is already {level_quality}!

request_modal.not_found.eng: Failed to send a level request: level not found (ID `{level_id}`)!
request_modal.not_found.rus: Failed to send a level request: level not found (ID `{level_id}`)!

request_modal.already_requested.eng: Please wait until the previous request (#{prev_request_id} by {prev_request_author}) for this level gets resolved
request_modal.already_requested.rus: Please wait until the previous request (#{prev_request_id} by {prev_request_author}) for this level gets resolved

request_modal.already_sent_to_rob.eng: This level has already been sent to RobTop (request #{prev_request_id} by {prev_request_author})
request_modal.already_sent_to_rob.rus: This level has already been sent to RobTop (request #{prev_request_id} by {prev_request_author})

request_modal.invalid_link.eng: Failed to send a level request: invalid YouTube link!
request_modal.invalid_link.rus: Failed to send a level request: invalid YouTube link!

request_modal.invalid_id.eng: Failed to send a level request: invalid ID (`{level_id}`)!
request_modal.invalid_id.rus: Failed to send a level request: invalid ID (`{level_id}`)!

request_modal.level_banned.forever.reaso.eng: Failed to send a level request! Level `{level_name}` was blacklisted by this server's staff due to the following reason: **{ban_reason}**
request_modal.level_banned.forever.reaso.rus: Failed to send a level request! Level `{level_name}` was blacklisted by this server's staff due to the following reason: **{ban_reason}**

request_modal.level_banned.forever.no_re.eng: Failed to send a level request! Level `{level_name}` was blacklisted by this server's staff.
request_modal.level_banned.forever.no_re.rus: Failed to send a level request! Level `{level_name}` was blacklisted by this server's staff.

request_modal.level_banned.temporarily.r.eng: Failed to send a level request! Level `{level_name}` can only be requested again {formatted_ban_expiration_time}. Reason: **{ban_reason}**
request_modal.level_banned.temporarily.r.rus: Failed to send a level request! Level `{level_name}` can only be requested again {formatted_ban_expiration_time}. Reason: **{ban_reason}**

request_modal.level_banned.temporarily.n.eng: Failed to send a level request! Level `{level_name}` can only be requested again {formatted_ban_expiration_time}
request_modal.level_banned.temporarily.n.rus: Failed to send a level request! Level `{level_name}` can only be requested again {formatted_ban_expiration_time}
